name: WP Version Remover
author: WP-EXPERTS.IN Team

sections.description:
The “WP Version Remover” plugin useful to remove wp version param from any enqueued scripts OR styles files. Sometime due to version parama( i.e ?ver) css/js update not reflect in front-end, In that case using “WP Version Remover” plugin we can remove version param easily.

Usign “WP Version Remover” plugin we can remove generator tag as well.

Note : please don’t forget to leave your valuable feedback and suggestions for make this plugin much more better compare to other plugins.

Do You Have Any Query? Submit here

Video Tutorial:

`Features`

  • An option for remove version param from any enqueued scripts
  • An option for remove version param from any enqueued styles
  • An option for remove generator tags from head section
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The settings page will be available under settings menu (Settings >> WP Version Remover)
sections.faq:
1.) Can i remove version param from any enqueued scripts only?
csv
* Yes, you need to checked corresponding check box from plugin settigs page.

2.) Can i remove version param from any enqueued styles only?

  • Yes,you need to checked corresponding check box from plugin settigs page.
